title: Gilead to acquire Immunomedics for $21 billion
description: Gilead Sciences will acquire biopharmaceutical company Immunomedics for $21 billion, the company announced on Sunday. The acquisition will expand Gilead's portfolio of treatments for various types of cancer.
source.name: CNN

title: Trump to hold first entirely indoor rally in nearly three months
description:

title: Deputy fired after video shows him repeatedly strike man
description: A sheriff's deputy in the Atlanta area was fired for excessive use of force after a social media video showed the deputy repeatedly striking a man, according to the Clayton County Sheriff's Office. CNN's Dianne Gallagher reports.

author: Kristen Holmes, Ellie Kaufman and Kelly Mena, CNN
title: Start of Pennsylvania's election is on hold because of ballot delay
description: In the latest sign of the chaos overshadowing the 2020 election, none of Pennsylvania's counties will be able to send out ballots to voters Monday, the first day the critical battleground state allows counties to do so.

author: Rob McLean, CNN Business
title: Microsoft's offer to buy US TikTok is rejected
description: ByteDance will not sell TikTok's US operations to Microsoft, according to Microsoft.

title: Trump finally releases controversial drug price executive order
description: More than seven weeks after President Donald Trump signed four executive orders aimed at lowering drug prices, the White House finally released Sunday perhaps the most controversial one.

author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
title: Here's how NFL Sunday games highlighted racial inequality in the US
description: The first NFL Sunday of the season kicked off with players and teams acknowledging the racial strife that has engulfed the United States in recent months.
source.name: CNN
